Package ch.pschatzmann.docker.jobs.model

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Container
    Model of Docker Container which provides the access to the information about the batch jobs
    Job
    Instance which is executed as scheduled job.
    JobCommandGroup
    A group of commands which can be processed together by the same execution logic
    JobDestination
    Defines where and how the job needs to be executed
    JobPlanner
    The job execution information is stored in Docker labels.
    JobPlanner.CommandInfo  
    Model
    Access to the basic Model of our application which consists of the containers, the API to docker commands and the scheduler.
    Utils
    Generic utils
    Volume
    Docker Mount information which is used to determine the backup directory
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    JobPlanner.Action  
    JobPlanner.Scenario
